title: TspCreateBookingResponse
description: CWT response for the booking request. This response payload simply must includes the TSP request identifier

requestId.description: The BRM unique identifier to track the booking request that was submitted

ceprReference.description: For HO it is the main returnee's reference. For a Family/Group Booking this represents the main returnee

uid.description: The CBR unique id generated for this request that can be used to track the status in CBR OR trace back any failures

bookingId.description: Booking ID OR Itinerary Number issued by the GDS

homeOfficeReference.description: This is the HO Reference which may or may not be available
